title: Verify all README files and run exit criteria
description:
Run the verification script to ensure all multilingual README files have been created correctly.

Files to verify:
- README.es.md (Spanish)
- README.fr.md (French)
- README.de.md (German)
- README.ja.md (Japanese)
- README.pt-BR.md (Brazilian Portuguese)

Run: bash verify.sh (or the equivalent checks)

Acceptance: All files exist and contain valid UTF-8 encoded text in their respective languages
